verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> nor גָבַ֣הּ <WH1361> is not haughty לִ֭בִּי <WH3820> my heart וְלֹא־ <WH3808> Nor רָמ֣וּ <WH7311> lofty עֵינַ֑י <WH5869> nor mine eyes וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor הִלַּ֓כְתִּי ׀ <WH1980> neither do I exercise בִּגְדֹל֖וֹת <WH1419> myself in great matters וּבְנִפְלָא֣וֹת <WH6381> or in things too high מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> too

אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֤א <WH3808> not שִׁוִּ֨יתִי ׀ <WH7737> Surely I have behaved וְדוֹמַ֗מְתִּי <WH1826> and quieted נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> myself כְּ֭גָמֻל <WH1580> as a child that is weaned עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> child against אִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> of his mother כַּגָּמֻ֖ל <WH1580> [is] even as a weaned child עָלַ֣י <WH5921> within נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul
יַחֵ֣ל <WH3176> hope יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> Let Israel אֶל־ <WH413> in יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> in the LORD מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> this וְעַד־ <WH5704> from henceforth and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever
